head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PERSICO, ALFRED R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PERSICO, ALFRED R.

block.p: PERSICO-Alfred R. On June 28, 2000, loved husband of Mary, loving father of George, Alfred E., Evelyn McCabe, Gerald, Anthony, Sally and the late Diane Marie, loving grandfather of 8. Also survived by four sisters. Reposing Redden Funeral Home, Thursday, 2-5 and 7-9 PM. Mass of Christian Burial, Friday, 9:30 AM Guardian Angel Church. Interment Calverton National Cemetery.
